body:
Hello Everyone,



I'm been having some problems with the Outdoor Comfort Calculator tool: without doing anything, it says that the Calculation was terminated by the user...Is there something I'm doing wrong or is it something else?



I've seen this discussion in other components [here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/pmv-calculator-warning-1-the-calculation-has-been-terminated-by), by I don't know if it's the same kind of problem



Thankyou very much in advance,



Pablo
topic: Outdoor Comfort Calculator -Calculation terminated by user

replies.body: Pablo, The problem is the same as in the discussion you mentioned. See attached for the fixed component/file. I've just copied what is in the LB_PMVComfortCalculator component. Chris: See image for the lines fixed. -A. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/PFt8hYehZ87fR9ZSsXy6DebMe9egBfwzXtXaSUuQIuO5utQ5V9pV1zCh5vhekwOnRB3ANwP5TuM0AzVB*Lbv1N3-r0X7oq3J/Capture.JPG)

Ok, thanks very much Abraham!

It works nice!

Pablo

Pablo,

Thanks for reporting the bug and...

Abraham,

Thank you so much for fixing it.  This issue also brought to my attention that both the PMV comfort calculator and the UTCI calculator needed to have the same fixes that resulted from this recent conversation:

[http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/show?id=2985...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topic/show?id=2985220%3ATopic%3A1497477&xg_source=msg)

All of the good stuff from here and the other referenced conversation has been fixed on the github:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/20fb27610d1dc08e...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/20fb27610d1dc08edca90a2419c09ffbbaed77a8)

and in the attached GH file.



Thanks again for all of the great work!

-Chris
